article: When I was in the middle school, my  _  did an exchange with a French school.Some of my classmates and I went to  _  in France.The school was in a small and beautiful town.One of my  _  , Robin, was staying with a family.The family had a yard of  _  .One evening, Robin's host mother asked him which his  _  chicken was.Robin looked at the chickens, and  _  a lovely one.So he pointed at it.  _  that evening, dinner was ready, and it was a roast chicken .The host mother was very proud and asked."  _  do you like your chicken?" At that time, Robin  _  what "favorite" meant.Oh, my poor chicken! After that, Robin felt  _  for days because he thought he made the chicken die .He also thought it was very delicious, though.
